message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of transmission of correlated sources in networks, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also introduces a new technique for proving converses, which is related to network coding (cs.NI). The concept of "uncertainty region" introduced in the paper might be of interest to researchers in statistical inference (cs.SI). The paper also provides a full characterization of the uncertainty region for the case of two correlated random variables, which involves analyzing the joint distribution of the sources, and thus might be relevant to researchers in data science (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG).
